description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              ***RESPONSIBILITIES
              

              •	Under the supervision and instructions of GAD, supervises administrative procedures and coordinates to maintain the Site Office activities
              
              •	Performs a variety of complex tasks to relieve supervisor of routine operational and administrative details by organizing, prioritizing, completing and/or delegating work when appropriate and within the established guidelines and policy.
              
              •	Act as department liaison to other departments, receive and apply thorough understanding of policies and procedures to reply to inquiries
              
              •	Takes custody of all site office assets, coordinates with Adm and Accounting team in Hanoi for  insurance update and regular spot checks
              
              •	Monitors office equipment, security, office supplies (including stationeries and other consumables)
              
              •	Arranges and supports business travelers.
              
              •	Coordinates and arranges for meetings, visits, trainings, workshops and conferences related to projects
              
              •	Liaises with the landlord for office lease and related matters
              
              •	Purchases necessary office items. Ensures purchasing procedures are followed, reports to GAD and GAM (HN) for any matters arises
              
              •	Follows up with payments, invoices and receipts .
              
              •	Supervises clerks, house-keeping and drivers
              
              •	Assists the GAD and GAM (HN) for all kinds of statutory reports submission.
              
              •	Assists the GAM (HN) for all visa and work permit matters
              
              •	Manages site office petty cash
              
              •	Coordinates on IT support matters
              
              •	Other administrative task as assigned.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              ***EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE AND GENERAL REQUIREMENTS
              

              •	BA in relevant field
              
              •	Possesses excellent communications skills in English (both written and verbal as Advanced business level and able to communicate using advanced vocabularies) and be computer literate
              
              •	Minimum of 8 years of experience in Admin works including at least 4 years in an international companies
              
              •	Good time management, organisation skills, and ability to work under high pressure with multi talks
              
              •	Be able to work and adapt in a multi- cultural working environment.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
